name: Saturn Cutting
description:
Kidnapped and trapped, you'll get home at any price.

Saturn Cutting is a space action adventure for PC.

Side-scrolling Metroidvania.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Rotate - A/D
  • Primary Fire - Space
  • Secondary Fire - Down
  • Forward - Up

Gamepad Controls:

  • Rotate - Left stick
  • Forward - A
  • Primary Fire -
  • Secondary Fire -

Some helpful debug stuff:

  • F2 brings up a list of all available scenes (regardless of whether they show up on the map)
  • F1 brings up a list of debug commands ('grant' will be useful for giving yourself items)
  • Both of those use a system of narrowing down choices by typing snippets of text.
  • Ctrl+G will get out of them.
  • ` (tilde) will toggle the debug console.
